arts.ttl: RB Leipzig's Peter Gulácsi and David Zec of Holstein Kiel on the mend after collision
arts.sum: A horrific and accidental coming together between RB Leipzig goalkeeper Peter Gulácsi and Holstein Kiel's David Zec overshadowed the teams' Bundesliga encounter on Saturday, yet good news was to follow, with both players emerging from the incident bruised but unbroken. With medical staff from both teams racing on to treat the players, it soon emerged that the Leipzig goalkeeper would need a stretcher to leave the pitch, while Kiel's defender managed to make it to the sidelines on foot, if very dazed.

arts.ttl: Zsolt Löw: “We were practically asking to concede“
arts.sum: Leipzig’s interim coach isn’t satisfied with his team’s display after a draw with Kiel

arts.ttl: Three things we learnt from the Bundesliga afternoon kick-offs: RB Leipzig, the race for Europe and who can win the league with only academy players?
arts.sum: No Bundesliga games on Friday evening as it was Good Friday (xEaster Jokes: 2.5), a Ruhestag (a holiday), so we had a bumper Bundesliga Saturday which shook up the race…

arts.ttl: Xavi hints at a summer departure from Leipzig
arts.sum: In an interview with Sky, Xavi Simons hasn’t ruled out the possibility of a summer exit from the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Benjamin Šeško salvages point for RB Leipzig against resilient Kiel
arts.sum: However, the match took a dramatic turn in the 63rd minute when Leipzig goalkeeper Gulácsi and Kiel's Zec collided violently while challenging for the ball. In the 74th minute, Loïs Openda was brought down in the box by Kiel goalkeeper Thomas Dähne, prompting the referee to point to the spot.

arts.ttl: Leipzig stay in fourth despite draw against Kiel
arts.sum: Kiel's record of scoring in every away game continues, but they had to settle for a point in Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Manchester United Join Race for RB Leipzig Stars
arts.sum: Xavi Simons celebrates vs Vfl Wolfsburg

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel install former Nürnberg executive as new sporting director
arts.sum: There's been a managerial shake up at the Bundesliga's last-placed team, Holstein Kiel.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig v Holstein Kiel preview: Lőw aims for three in three against cellar-dwellers
arts.sum: Leipzig need to extend their winning streak to stay in a Champions League qualification spot.

arts.ttl: Löw discusses Kiel clash and how Leipzig will replace Xavi Simons
arts.sum: At a press conference on Friday, Zsolt Löw discussed RB Leipzig’s upcoming clash with Holstein Kiel and how he plans to fill the gap left by the suspended Xavi Simons.
